articles.title: Blast from the past: gamma-ray burst strikes Earth from distant exploding star - European Space Agency
articles.description: An enormous burst of gamma rays, detected by ESA’s Integral space telescope, has struck Earth. The blast caused a significant disturbance in our planet’s ionosphere. Such disturbances are usually associated with energetic particle events on the Sun but this o…
articles.content:
